thread.section_title: Hotel Magellan - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent
thread.title_full: Excellent - Review of Hotel Magellan, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Viki G
title: Excellent
text: I stayed there for 5 days during a business trip and the experience was amazing. It's located in a really quiet area and next to a metro stop. It's far from the city centre but in metro that's not a big deal at all. The service was extremely kind and the breakfast very good. The room was really clean and comfy. The only thing that I could say but it's not bad at all, is that the bathroom is a bit old..but quite clean and works perfectly. It's just an aesthetic thing.. 100% recommend.
